data_dictionary.name: Personal_COVIDtest
data_dictionary.description: Have you been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)? If so, what was the result?

encodings.1.0: I have been tested and I tested positive (I had coronavirus)
encodings.2.0: I have been tested and I tested negative (I did not have coronavirus)
encodings.3.0: I have been tested and I do not know the result
encodings.4.0: I had COVID-19 symptoms, but did not get tested

data_dictionary.name: Household_COVIDtest
data_dictionary.description: Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

encodings.1.0: They have been tested and they tested positive (They had coronavirus)
encodings.2.0: They have been tested and they tested negative (They did not have coronavirus)
encodings.3.0: They have been tested and I do not know the result
encodings.4.0: They had COVID-19 symptoms, but did not get tested

encodings.1.0: I communicate with them more often than before
encodings.2.0: I communicate with them about the same as before
encodings.3.0: I communicate with them less often than before

data_dictionary.name: ObtainFood_Difficulty
data_dictionary.description: [Obtaining the food that you need because of the COVID-19 pandemic or social distancing rules] How much difficulty do you have…

data_dictionary.name: ObtainMedicine_Difficulty
data_dictionary.description: [Obtaining the medicine that you need because of the COVID-19 pandemic or social distancing rules] How much difficulty do you have…

data_dictionary.name: RoutineMedCare_Difficulty
data_dictionary.description: [With getting routine medical care that you need because of the COVID-19 pandemic or social distancing rules] How much difficulty do you have…

data_dictionary.name: HesitateMedicalCare
data_dictionary.description: Would you hesitate to seek care if you needed medical care for a health condition?

encodings.1.0: Yes, I would hesitate to seek care due to the COVID-19 pandemic primarily to avoid exposure to the clinic or hospital
encodings.2.0: Yes, I would hesitate to seek care due to the COVID-19 pandemic primarily to avoid overburdening the healthcare system
encodings.3.0: Yes, I would hesitate to seek care because you do not have health insurance
encodings.4.0: Yes, I would hesitate to seek care for some other reason
encodings.5.0: No, I would not hesitate to seek care

data_dictionary.name: StayHomeOrder_Agreement
data_dictionary.description: Do you live in a city/town with a stay-at-home or shelter-in-place order, and do you agree with the order?

encodings.1.0: Yes we have an order, and I agree with it
encodings.2.0: Yes we have an order, and I do not agree with it
encodings.3.0: No we do not have an order, and I think we should have an order
encodings.4.0: No we do not have an order, and I agree with not having an order

data_dictionary.name: PainControl_Difficulty
data_dictionary.description: Since the beginning of March 2020, have you noticed any difficulties getting adequate pain control for acute or chronic health conditions?

encodings.1.0: I haven’t had any conditions that have required pain control
encodings.2.0: I have had conditions that needed pain management and could get the medicine or therapies I needed
encodings.3.0: I have had conditions that needed pain management but could not get the medicine because of issues related to COVID
encodings.4.0: I have had conditions that needed pain management but couldn't get medicine for reasons that don't have to do w/ COVID

data_dictionary.name: PS_A_Medicaid
data_dictionary.description: [I favor expanding Medicaid insurance benefits for low income families to provide coverage for treatment of opioid use disorders…] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_B_Naloxone
data_dictionary.description: [I favor making naloxone…widely available and affordable without a prescription] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_C_Mandatory
data_dictionary.description: [I believe that making drug treatment mandatory is an effective way to help people with an opioid use disorder] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_D_GovSpend
data_dictionary.description: [I favor increasing government spending to improve treatment of opioid use disorders] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: DS_E_Schools
data_dictionary.description: [High schools and colleges should be allowed to dismiss or expel a person with an opioid use disorder] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: DS_F_Physicians
data_dictionary.description: [Physicians and other healthcare providers should be allowed to refuse to treat a person with an opioid use disorder] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: DS_G_Employers
data_dictionary.description: [Employers should be allowed to deny employment to a person with a current opioid use disorder] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: DS_H_Landlords
data_dictionary.description: [Landlords should be allowed to deny housing to a person with a current opioid use disorder/addiction] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: Release_Incarcerated
data_dictionary.description: [Jails and Prisons should evaluate whether those convicted of non-violent crimes should be released to prevent the spread of COVID-19 within jails/prisons] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_A_HistoryWork
data_dictionary.description: [I would be willing to have a person with a past history of opioid use disorder start working closely with me on a job] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_B_HistoryMarry
data_dictionary.description: [I am comfortable having a person with a past history of opioid use disorder marry into my family] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_C_CurrentWork
data_dictionary.description: [I would be willing to have a person with a current opioid use disorder start working closely with me on a job] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_D_CurrentMarry
data_dictionary.description: [I would be comfortable having a person with a current opioid use disorder marry into my family] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_E_Dangerous
data_dictionary.description: [People with a current opioid use disorder…are more dangerous than the general population] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_F_Trust
data_dictionary.description: [A person who currently has opioid use disorder…cannot be trusted] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?
